review.reviewBody: Food was amazing but lacking filling in pork bum. Overall delicious food.

General Tsao Chicken was not crunchy. Practically soggy. Taste was 5/10.  Pork buns had very little pork. Disappointing overall. I used to love the Peaceful on Broadway. This one was very unsatisfactory.
the chicken is lesser,more of the flour crisp than the chicken.

General Tsao was not crunchy. Practically soggy. Taste was 5/10. I've had much better l. Fried Pork buns had very little pork inside. I used to love going to Peaceful on Broadway. Not sure what happened to this location.
the beef rolls were delicious as was the General Tso Chicken
